reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have super straight hair. I can’t understand how such a highly talked about gloss gives me 0 shine (not even a little). When I wash it off, my hair feels so dry and once it dries, my ends feel brittle. Maybe mine is defective or perhaps it doesn’t go well with my shampoo/conditioner. It’s a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally makes my hair so smooth and looks like a professional blow out! I usually have pretty frizzy hair at the end of the day even when I blow dry my hair, and on day three my hair still looks great and is smooth and shiny!
